summary: This is an email chain from July 9, 2020, regarding a victim of Jeffrey Epstein who contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to file a claim for Crime Victims compensation. A Victim Witness Coordinator acknowledges sending the application and will follow up.

persons.name: Victim Witness Coordinator
persons.context: Employee of the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York who is handling a victim's compensation claim related to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Victim Compensation Inquiry
events.description: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein contacts the U.S. Attorney's Office to file a claim for Crime Victims compensation. The Victim Witness Coordinator sends the application and plans to follow up.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein was actively seeking compensation through the Crime Victims compensation program as of July 2020.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was involved in facilitating this victim's claim.
The communication demonstrates ongoing legal and administrative proceedings related to Epstein's victims years after his death.
